menu.aboutTitle: Tell your friends and family about SafeDeal
menu.freeToUseDesc: Using our service is free for you. When you make a purchase, the store pays us a small fee for guiding you to the best product.
menu.dataPrivacyDesc: We use publicly available data only, ensuring no brand or shop influences our recommendations.

WelcomeTour.TourHomeScreen: Home Screen: Access all main app features from here.
WelcomeTour.TourInsightsTab: Product Insights &Get detailed insights about the product's performance, popularity, and price trends. Look for color-coded indicators (red/yellow/green) to quickly assess product quality and reliability.
WelcomeTour.TourReviewsTab: Customer Reviews &Read customer reviews and ratings to help you make an informed purchase decision.
WelcomeTour.TourImagesTab: Product Images &View images of the product from various angles, including customer-uploaded photos.
WelcomeTour.TourVideosTab: Product Videos &Watch video reviews and demonstrations of the product.
WelcomeTour.TourFinishDescription: You now know the key features of Safe Deal. Start exploring and happy shopping!
WelcomeTour.TourShareStep1Description: Share from Amazon, AliExpress, eBay app, or a browser
WelcomeTour.TourShareStep2Description: Go to product page, Select the Product
WelcomeTour.TourShareStep3Description: On the product page, tap the share button
WelcomeTour.TourShareStep4Description: Select Safe Deal from the list
